Introduction
This topic contains general information on the adverse action proposal period, including
definition of adverse action proposal period
basic rule for 65-day limit
calculating the adverse action proposal period
, and
extending the adverse action proposal period
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Adverse Action Proposal Period
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
